question: The soldiers that served as teachers in American-sponsored public schools were called____
A proclamation containing American propaganda to convince the American and Philippine public that their invasion was justified.

The last Filipino general to surrender under American forces.
A tactic used by unsurrendering Filipinos after Aguinaldo was captured.
The first American civil-governor appointed by President William McKinley.
This is the place where the first shots against Filipino troops occured, which sparked the Philippine-American War
